text: Hitobito no nakaniha,`watashi-tachi wa, arrā o shinkō shimasu.' To iuga, ichido arrā (no michi no tame) ni kunan ni au to, ningen no hakugai o marude arrā no chōbatsudearu ka no yō ni kangaeru mono ga aru. Mata moshi anata no nushi kara no tasuke (to shōri) ga motarasa reru to, kare-ra wa kanarazu,`hontōni watashi-tachi wa, anata gata to isshodeshita.' Nado to iu. Ban'nin no mune no naka ni daku koto o mo yoku shiru okata wa, arrāde wanai ka
